I was working in agency-land back in 2016 when @Netlify introduced their Deploy Button. I instantly loved it. It let me create a set of project starter templates which could all be cloned to bootstrap new projects with a single click. https://t.co/4z6GEBAqiO https://t.co/d4DhazZarl
